comments.body: Not sure there are any great alternatives, but the overloading of "message" is slightly unfortunate. May be fine long term since the project is gradually preferring the term "record" for log messages.

Yeah, I think we should start referring to "records" rather than "messages" in the context of the kafka log.  The "log message" vs. "RPC message" thing is an existing point of confusion and I was just using the existing terminology (unfortunately)
